short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficient customer support management for Shopify. Easily access the Shopify order and customer information in your Gmail inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your Shopify store's customer support. Shopify Gmail Helpdesk lets you see order details and customer information right in your Gmail inbox. Boost productivity and provide great customer service easily.
